import numpy as np

source.129bd7b8:
unlabled_col = []
N_DIVISION = 10
for colname, colvalue in train.iteritems():
    if type(colvalue[1]) != str and colvalue.nunique() >= 10:
        unlabled_col.append(colname)
        train[colname] = pd.cut(train[colname],N_DIVISION,labels=np.arange(0, N_DIVISION, 1))
        test[colname] = pd.cut(test[colname],N_DIVISION,labels=np.arange(0, N_DIVISION, 1))
        
unlabled_col
